attributes.action: restore the playing of the National anthem on BBC TV and radio at or around close of broadcast each night.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Of course BBC TV/radio broadcast is now 24 hourly continuous service.

However, when I think back 15 years or so, when BBC 1 would cease broadcast for the night, at the end of each day, the British national anthem would be played to conclude the days broadcast.

In the last 15 years or so, I believe TV/radio broadcasting has been in a large way responsible for the decline in British morals... reality TV, unlimited swearing etc. The British public is crying out for a little more moral guidance, in what it should mean to be part of the Great British public. 

Instructing the British terrestrial channels to respect the country they are based in by playing the national anthem at around midnight each day, would be I believe a step(even if a very small one) in the right direction.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
